class.name: OilSampleReading
class.meta: Record of an oil sample reading (lab results) for an oil sample.

property.name: externalId
property.meta: ID received from external system (ie. Oil Commander) during import of record

many-to-one.name: oilSample
many-to-one.meta: The oil sample for which this reading applies

property.name: aluminium
property.meta: Particles per million of aluminium found in sample

property.name: barium
property.meta: Particles per million of barium found in sample

property.name: cadmium
property.meta: Particles per million of cadmium found in sample

property.name: calcium
property.meta: Particles per million of calcium found in sample

property.name: chromium
property.meta: Particles per million of chromium found in sample

property.name: copper
property.meta: Particles per million of copper found in sample

property.name: iron
property.meta: Particles per million of iron found in sample

property.name: lead
property.meta: Particles per million of lead found in sample

property.name: tin
property.meta: Particles per million of tin found in sample

property.name: nickel
property.meta: Particles per million of nickel found in sample

property.name: silicon
property.meta: Particles per million of silicon found in sample

property.name: sodium
property.meta: Particles per million of sodium found in sample

property.name: potassium
property.meta: Particles per million of potassium found in sample

property.name: molybdenuum
property.meta: Particles per million of molybdenuum found in sample

property.name: boron
property.meta: Particles per million of boron found in sample

property.name: magnesium
property.meta: Particles per million of magnesium found in sample

property.name: zinc
property.meta: Particles per million of zinc found in sample

property.name: phosphorus
property.meta: Particles per million of phosphorus found in sample

property.name: silver
property.meta: Particles per million of silver found in sample

property.name: manganese
property.meta: Particles per million of manganese found in sample

property.name: vandium
property.meta: Particles per million of vandium found in sample

property.name: titanium
property.meta: Particles per million of titanium found in sample

property.name: waterPercentage
property.meta: Percentage of water contained in oil sample

property.name: fuelPercentage
property.meta: Percentage of fuel contained in oil sample

property.name: viscosityAt40C
property.meta: Viscosity of oil sample at 40 C degrees

property.name: totalBaseNumber
property.meta: Total Base Number of oil sample. Total Base Number (TBN) is a measure of a lubricant's reserve alkalinity. It is measured in milligrams of potassium hydroxide per gram (mg KOH/g).

property.name: totalAcidNumber
property.meta: Total Acid Number of oil sample. Total Acid Number (TAN) (or "neutralization number" or "acid value" or "acidity") is measured in milligrams of potassium hydroxide per gram (mg KOH/g).
